name: Puzzle Celebrity
description:
This Puzzle game provide hours of entertainment for your whole family. You can play puzzle game according celebrity selection. After that, you can try to solve your puzzle.

Features:
1. 3x3, 4x4, 5x5 grid puzzle support
2. User can select celebrity puzzle according to his/her choice
3. Refresh the puzzle game whenever user want to replay game
4. great user interface
